Title: Todo es posible en Granada
Writer: José Luis Sáenz de Heredia (story), Carlos Blanco (story), José Luis Sáenz de Heredia (screenplay), Carlos Blanco (screenplay)
Actors: Merle Oberon, Francisco Rabal, Peter Damon, Rafael Bardem
Plot: An American oil company buys land in Granada, but they have problems when one owner alone does not want to sell.
